name: Kingdom Slots HD - Slot Machine by Gold Coin Kingdom
name_original: Kingdom Slots HD - Slot Machine by Gold Coin Kingdom
description:
The #1 new free to play slot machine game now available!

Enjoy the excitement of beautiful slot machines, bonus games, huge payouts, and multiple levels.

Kingdom Slots HD offers the following features:

- Tons of unique slot machines (with more being released all the time!)
- Free bonus games to win even more coins and increase your payouts
- Boosters! Use boosters to multiply your winnings. Win boosters with more game play
- Huge coin sales!
- Daily bonuses and hourly bonuses for more free coins
- Full game center integration
- HeyZap integration so you can play with friends
- Facebook integration - compete against your Facebook friends!


Download this game today for HUGE payouts! It's never been easier to win big over and over!

Questions? Email us at support@goldcoinkingdom.com and we'll respond quickly.
